Court Payments

**1. Pay fines by mail.**  
-The East Bernard Municipal Court accepts Cashier's Checks or Money Orders **ONLY**. Do not send Personal Checks . They will be returned.  
-Mail to East Bernard Municipal Court, 704 Church Street, East Bernard, TX 77435.

**2. Pay fines in person.**  
-East Bernard Municipal Court is located inside [East Bernard City Hall](https://www.eastbernardtx.com/page/%3Ciframe%20src='https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3471.5293573543167!2d-96.06841198489688!3d29.530074682072364!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x86416ccb565c8637%3A0x23d0f33abd5fe1d8!2sEast%20Bernard%20City%20Hall!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sus!4v1590008984711!5m2!1sen!2sus%27%20width=%27600%27%20height=%27450%27%20frameborder=%270%27%20style=%27border:0;%27%20allowfullscreen=%27%27%20aria-hidden=%27false%27%20tabindex=%270%27%3E%3C/iframe%3E), 704 Church Street, East Bernard, TX 77435.  
-Cashier's Checks, Money Orders, and Cash are accepted in person.

**3. Pay fines after hours.**   
-Fines may be left in the red drop box located by the flag pole outside of East Bernard City Hall.

**4.****Pay fines online.**

-You may visit [here](https://www.govrec.com/home/eastbernardcitx) to pay your citation online.   
-You will need your citation number to process your payment.    
-There is an additional processing fee for this service.

**5. Scan this QR code.**

[Citation QR code](https://www.eastbernardtx.com/upload/page/0197/Citation%20QR%20code.pdf)

**IMPORTANT:**
--------------

  

-IF YOU FAIL TO TAKE CARE OF THIS CITATION, THE RENEWAL OF YOUR DRIVER’S LICENSE WILL BE DENIED AND/OR WARRANTS FOR YOUR ARREST WILL BE ISSUED.  ADDITIONAL CHARGES & FEES MAY BE ASSESSED.

-For Driver’s License, expired registration, and defective equipment violations you may submit proof of compliance/correction via email to be reviewed for dismissal. Dismissals are subject to an administration fee of $10.00. Your citation will not be dismissed before the administration fee is received.

-Failure to Maintain Financial Responsibility (No Insurance) will be dismissed upon presentation to the Court proof that the vehicle was covered by a valid policy at the time of the ticket.

**-JUVENILES (under 17 year) MUST appear in court with his/her parent or legal guardian.**

**-ALL alcohol/tobacco violation involving minors MUST contact the court.**
